post.body: Woot! Juggalos don't stand a chance.
Nice! And the bonus is that we can see Hanson together whenever they come to LA instead of me dragging my poor husband!
You're gonna love this... I'm completely and totally craving Arby's right now. I'll think of you as I drive-thru.
Where in CA are you moving?
You should start charging her rent for every day over your due date she's been in there!
thats one stubborn kid!
Where did he go? I wanna know.
And thats his place! It looks like its gonna be a good show. In your pants.
you should pick one up anyway, just to be prudent.
No sitter, but i'll be partying with you in spirit. Here at home. Alone. Sad. Lonely. Blogging.
If i can get someone to watch my beast of a kid, i'm totally there!
I want to be your date! YUM!
aaah! I didn't even think about that, i totally will!
I'm totally burning the office space soundtrack so I can do it up properly out in my field. Its gonna be amazing.
you're the lava in my volcanic heart!
not a clue. i'll know more monday
I lava you too. I've been really really sensitive this week, I am pretty much ready to get done with december and its only the 6th
if we hadn't delivered in the hospital we might not have cary thanks to the serious complications with his birth.
Seriously, you'd have to be a tool not to love them!
Aurora agrees deep down inside, don't listen to what she says.
Yay Dixie Chicks! I karaoked a DC song with my redneck family once and got booed off the stage because they were too liberal.
(Because you've doomed yourself now, you can't back out of it... bwahahahahahahahha)
YES! YES! YES YES YES! You'd love playing derby, and derby would LOVE you! Do you wanna start now, or wait until I'm back?
I larvae you!
http://tinyurl.com/57aoxy Its just for you!
REALLY?! I am SO EXCITED for that!
you and me, buddy. Lets both give this week a resounding "Up Yours"... Yeah... That'll teach it!
@jemerling I wish there was some juggalo identification system. like the registered sex offenders website maybe?
he puts on such a great show, too! I saw him about 5 years ago, what a night! Jealous!
with smartground plz!
I know, it really was more like "hippie fair", huh?
you only like him because he's sexually appalling
I don't want to do ANYTHING today.
mmmm hungry
I just got the "Congrats, you have gestational diabetes" call.
Changing a diaper, then watching "A Walk To Remember" because this house is so not getting cleaned today. And I need some Mandy Moore.
Arbys consumed, Yarn Purchased, and time to relax before tonight's cold-tastic walk down Christmas Tree Lane
Cary is a gross, disgusting little boy. He just came out of his room chewing on a diaper that hadn't been thrown away. EWWWWW.
chocolate milk is soooo good. It makes me not even regretful about being awake !
I love bedtime.
Gonna go exercise, so naturally I want nothing but doughnuts for breakfast. I'm choking down cereal as we speak hoping to curb this craving
So I totally thought I was crazy and had made it up, but I DID hear sirens and gunfire the other night! http://tiny.cc/pIK6l
OMG... Burlesque lessons! Sign me up! I wonder if they'll let me play even if i'm roughly the size of a small cruise ship...
I love how timeless some things are, Cary is totally into the animated rudolph cartoon, despite crappy sound and really bad shaky visuals.
I just wanna holla @fresnobeehive, I probably can't go, but tonight is Beehive's B-day party at Audie's olympic! Make it happen!
Porch cleaned off!
My moods are affected by the foodz i eat. If i eat no foods I have bad moodz. Grrrr. (So I'm making Scalloped Potatoes.)
There is nothing more promising than a brand new planner.
I was feeling pretty crappy, but I IMed with talisha for a while and she's so positive its hard not to follow suit. LAVA TALISHA!
Mmmm.. Doug's bringing home tacos!
really really angry right now.
how long can you honestly shoot guns for? I really want lunch.
I am so hungry I could eat your house.
Doug: "Bryan Adams Kicked Ass!" Me: "Thats a phrase that can't come up too often"
I'm more excited about Samba than Bryan Adams. I hope my steak will be singing "Cuts Like a Knife" when it sees me coming.
Did I mention that my Hanson book came in? Yeah. YEAH.
what do i want to do this morning? Oh yeah, curl up and pretend its not morning.
I hardly accomplished ANYTHING today. I am tired but i don't wanna go to bed with so little done.
Cary is FINALLY asleep!
BTW, I apologize for being snappy, paranoid, angry, moody and generally unstable in the last few days, I don't know what my problem is.
We got a new printer! I'm totally gonna go "Office Space" on my old one, i hated that thing.
So this week sucked, I'm pretty glad to be getting into a new, hopefully less sucky, week.
oh boy am i moody.
I don't like your pirattitude, doug.
Derby will keep on in Fresno! http://community.livejournal.com/ljfresno/620325.html
this really sucks.
I've been given my restrictions, now off to take cute pictures of cary and see what i can scrounge up for lunch.
i should sleep. Appointment first thing tomorrow. But i REALLY want oranges.
I have the sweetest little boy in the universe. I am so lucky.
I love my healthy son who eats apples instead of chicken nuggets. He's much better than I am.
Our Christmas tree broke. Life is not going my way. I'm hungry.
Ugh. Screw you, body!
Thank you, Cary for dumping your entire plate of food on the ground. We've been trying eating at the "Big Boy Table In The Big Boy Chair"
fantastic. I just talked with my "diabetes educator" and I get to go in Thursday to learn Insulin! BAH! It just keeps piling up.
Clothes are all folded (for now.) Ugh I hate that Laundry is never ending. The bright side? Tofu for lunch!
I hate it when i lose steam in the middle of something. Half of the clean clothes are folded and put away...
finally, 128. I'm actually within the range I should be in. I feel better about the world now.
My walking buddy canceled on me, I guess its gonna be raking the leaves for exercise today. I hate being productive... whine whine whine
Not quite sure why I'm not dealing so well. 10 weeks and five days. thats 75 days, right? I can deal. I can.
I should go clean the utility room, i have no clue when our new washer and dryer will be delivered. Ughhhhhh.
W&D to be delivered between 3-5. SCORE! I can be lazy ALL morning!
ohhh goodie goodie gumdrops! I DO get insulin. UGH. Tomorrow I get to learn all about that. Oh, and no more fruit. What a joke.
Cary just abruptly stopped playing, laid down on the floor and fell asleep. I love toddlers!
yay new wahser and dryer!
Religion is far more of a choice than homosexuality.Gay people dont choose to be gay.At what age did you choose not to be gay?-Jon Stewart,
(on The Daily Show while interview huckabee. Go Jon!)
"we'll go out to dinner and i'll take you to see any movie you want to see......... that isn't twilight, please god not twilight"-- Doug
Cant take criticism this week. Anyone who wants to complain about the way i do my job can hold it in or deal with my tears.
I want Taylor to pick baby names for everyone! We could all be screwed up! http://tinyurl.com/6eyq3t
Cary is eating a graham cracker. I didn't give him a graham cracker. Where does he hide these things‽ I'll interrobang you until you tell!
I really am having a hard time performing basic functions, that means everyone at work is just gonna have to deal with disappointment.
February 13th! Boy name option has changed to JASON... can you figure out why? (look at a calendar)
too early to celebrate? I've had 2 consecutive blood glucose levels that are within my target range! Hurray! now if only I weren't hungry
insulin is getting easier to do.i don't even hesitate (much) when I inject it.I'll finally be a pro at this and then(hopefully)it'll be gone
really tired.
So seriously? Ridiculous, body. just ridiculous.
At least I wasn't the cause of today's drama, but how i deal with it could affect more drama.
i am a pro.
Fresno: if you weren't at tonight's burlesque show at full circle, you missed out.
i hate that the people who always play music loudly always have poor taste
Doug's taking cary out so i can have some alone time! woo!
I danced like a maniac for 30 minutes and it totally worked, even though my fasting was high,I managed to stay within range for my post meal
working out to see if it works out... its worth a try. ugh
crap, 103... LoL, i must have been incompetant. so much for insulin, I knew I probably didn't use it right. Tomorrow is a new night.
by the way, 2 months and 7 1/2 hours from now i'll for sure have a baby in my arms!
I hope i did that right... yay for new things. At least I've never been freaked out by needles, that would have complicated my ineptitude.
tonight is my first time with insulin. <insert cheesy virgin joke here if you will, i'm too tired to think of anything clever>
